org.wso2.carbon.identity.oauth2.validators

Class OAuth2ScopeValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wso2.carbon.identity.oauth2.validators.OAuth2ScopeValidator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JDBCScopeValidator

    public abstract class OAuth2ScopeValidator
extends Object
    This class should be extended by all OAuth2 Scope Validators.

    • Method Detail

      • validateScope

        public abstract boolean validateScope(AccessTokenDO accessTokenDO,
                                      String resource)
                               throws IdentityOAuth2Exception
        Method to validate the scopes associated with the access token against the resource that is being accessed.
        Parameters:
        accessTokenDO - - The access token data object
        resource - - The resource that is being accessed.
        Returns:
        - true if scope is valid, false otherwise
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuth2Exception

      • validateScope

        public boolean validateScope(OAuthTokenReqMessageContext tokReqMsgCtx)
                      throws IdentityOAuth2Exception,
                             org.wso2.carbon.user.api.UserStoreException
        Method to validate scopes in the token request against the roles of user
        Parameters:
        tokReqMsgCtx -
        Returns:
        - true if the user has enough permission to generate tokens with requested scopes or no scopes are requested, otherwise false
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuth2Exception
        org.wso2.carbon.user.api.UserStoreException

      • validateScope

        public boolean validateScope(OAuthAuthzReqMessageContext authzReqMessageContext)
                      throws org.wso2.carbon.user.api.UserStoreException,
                             IdentityOAuth2Exception
        Method to validate scopes in the authorization request against the roles of the user.
        Parameters:
        authzReqMessageContext - Authorization request
        Returns:
        - true if the user has enough permission to generate tokens with requested scopes or no scopes are requested, otherwise false
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuth2Exception
        org.wso2.carbon.user.api.UserStoreException

      • canHandle

        public boolean canHandle(OAuth2TokenValidationMessageContext messageContext)
        Checks whether a given scopes can be handled by the validator.
        Parameters:
        messageContext - OAuth2TokenValidationMessageContext for the request.
        Returns:
        true if the given scopes can be validated, otherwise false.

      • getValidatorName

        public String getValidatorName()
        Method to get the name of the implemented scope validator name to display in the UI and save in the database. As default the class name is used.
        Returns:
        Name of the scope validator
